postgresql-mysql.title: 1. 利用 PostgreSQL 作圖形相似度計算 2.PostgreSQL 與 Oracle / MySQL 協作
postgresql-mysql.intro:
1. 載入圖形資料取特徵作相似度比對 2. 外部資料源的操作及快速對映的方法 

----

osdatabase.title: Open Source Database
osdatabase.intro: This community room is going to invite speakers from open source databases (both RDBMS - refer https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/RDBMA and NoSQL databases - refer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NoSQL) researchers/developers/contributors/communities/users, to share their newly developed products/use cases/best practices and insight to the industry trend. We hope some topics could be delivered by organizations that running systems on open source databases and created huge success thus the track and benefits the users and developer in Taiwan.
